name: Xiaomi Redmi 9A Dual Sim
addtional: Rear Camera 108 MP wide-angle camera  8MP ult Front Camera Processor Qualcomm Snapdragon 732G octa-core  Battery Capacity 5020mAh with 33W fast charging Connectivity Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, GPS, USB type-C, Arc side-mounted fingerprint sensor  Rear Camera - 108MP wide-angle camera (1/1.52” sensor size, 2.1μm 9-in-1 Super Pixel)  - 8MP ultra-wide camera (118° FOV, f/2.2) - 5MP telemacro camera (f/2.4, AF) - 2MP depth sensor (f/2.4) Display 6.6-inch splashproof AMOLED DotDisplay with 120Hz refresh rate
